GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles. Accepts an optional topic query to filter articles by topic

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article by its id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an array of comments for the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the article with the given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an articles votes using the article_id
